ygData.subject: Re: Gigantic Zweihander - Also John..
ygData.msgSnippet: well, we warriors need to cry like babies because we can t get our way too..... Sorry, thats BS, removing a high lvl item because some newbies can t complete
ygData.messageBody:
well, we warriors need to cry like babies because we can't get our way too.....

Sorry, thats BS, removing a high lvl item because some newbies can't complete some meaningless quest....c'mon.....thats crap....I'm still gonna camp him to death.

>>> "Kevin Koen" <big_k69@...> 5.25.99 12:02:25 PM >>>
From: "Kevin Koen" <big_k69@...>

To all the is persueing the Gigantic Zweihander!!!

I spoke with a gm early this morning about this sword
indeed it was carried by Karg but Karg is part of a quest that is
grealty persued. because of this sword Karg was beeing killed so often that
people could not complete there quest and after much complaing the sword is
no longer available within the game until they find another suitable NPC to
weild it...THis is the official word from a gm...sorry to spoil anyones
intentions

> > barbarian has it? My drow warrior is already KOS there, so it's no big
> > deal if i kill a few barbarians :)
> >
> > To John - I didn't catch you on last eve. Hopefully tonight after work
